Name: La Casa De La Mar
Description: Airy, relaxed gathering place dishing up burgers & finger foods, plus live music, cocktails & beer.
tags: Music, Bar, Burgers, Live Music, Nightlife

Name: La Pepica
Description: Long-running restaurant known for seafood & vegetable paellas, plus a terrace with sea views.

Name: Ca la Mar
Description: Seafood, meat & vegetable tapas in a relaxed, intimate locale also serving sangria & cocktails.

Name: Tasca El Botijo
Description: Open from morning to late, this easygoing outpost with a patio serves traditional tapas & beers.

Name: Tasca Angel
Description: Traditional tapas, wines & beers are served in this intimate, down-to-earth restaurant.

Name: Arandinos Tapas Valencia
Description: Classic traditional tapas restaurant in El Carmen. Easy going, good food, and authentic square.

Name: Cantina Monterey
Description: Authentic mexican tacos. Affordable prices and usually very Spanish crowd.

Name: MESTIZO - Café • Brunch • Tapas
Description: Nice and hip little coffee place in El Carmen. Great coffee and sweets, as well as some selection of tapas.

Name: Tyris On Tap
Description: A selection of pizzas & craft beers in a down-to-earth restaurant that has a terrace.

Name: La Fabrica de Hielo
Description: Modern culture center & bar with industrial-chic decor, hosting live music & other events.
tags: Live Music, Bar, Drinks, DJ, Nightlife

Name: Mercabanyal
Description: Chill venue with a variety of vendors serving local & global eats such as sushi, crepes & burgers.

Name: Radio City
Description: Well-known, vintage venue for cocktails, plus performances from flamenco dancing to jazz music.
tags: Live Music, Bar, Drinks, DJ, Nightlife, Spanish

Name: MASA MADRE
Description: Easygoing restaurant offering a diverse menu of handmade pizzas, plus salads & daily specials.

Name: HUNDRED BURGERS
Description: One of the best Burger places in Valencia. Multiple restaurants around the city. More towards the pricy side of Burgers.

Name: Horchatería Subies
Description: The Horchata Valenciana is produced with tigernut, water and sugar. The drink has a sweet taste reminiscent of nuts. This is one of the best places to get it.

Name: Restaurante Oslo
Description: Locally sourced, vegetarian & vegan specialties served in a country-chic destination.

Name: Bekaa Bistro
Description: Intimate eatery offering classic Lebanese dishes, wines & Sunday brunch, plus open-air dining.

Name: MAYAN COFFEES Organic Specialty Coffe
Description: Awesome small coffee place in El Carmen, next to the old city wall. Different types of coffee and a selection of sweets and sandwiches.

Name: Mare Meua Bar de Tapas
Description: Casual, bustling eatery offering an array of classic tapas & snacks, plus cocktails & draft brews.

Name: Federal Valencia
Description: Great coffee place to spend some time reading or working in a nice and relaxed atmosphere.

Name: Plaza del negrito
Description: Vibrant square in the center of Valencia with several bars and outdoor seating.

Name: MAT32 // DISCOS BAR
Description: Great place for some drinks with electronic music. Relaxed and easy-going.

Name: Boatella Tapas
Description: Busy, casual tapas bar with outdoor seating serving market-fresh seafood, paella & classic desserts.

Name: Amor Amargo
Description: Nice tapas bar with outdoor and indoor seating. Great interior design.

Name: Blackbird
Description: Great coffee place to spend some time reading or working in a nice and relaxed atmosphere.

Name: Sagardi Valencia Centro
Description: Pintxos (small slices of bread upon which an ingredient or mixture of ingredients is placed and fastened with a toothpick) appetizers, plus grilled Basque meat & fish dishes, at a sleek, lively tapas bar.

Name: Kebab Bolsería
Description: One of the best Kebab places in town. Great for a little bite throughout the day or later at night.

Name: The Central Market of Valencia
Description: Modernista market building with colorful tiles & a diverse collection of stalls, separated by type.

Name: Kawori
Description: Funky eatery whipping up Japanese staples such as donburi, tempura & sushi, plus wine & sake.

Name: Café Berlin
Description: Cocktails, draft beers & a musical soundtrack at a colorful bar with retro furnishings & a terrace.

Name: Ostras Pedrín Valencia
Description: Compact, contemporary tavern featuring raw oysters, salted nibbles, salads, wine & cava.

Name: Restaurant Yuso
Description: Authentic Valencian restaurant. Mainly outdoor seating. Great for Paella and seafood.
tags: Seafood, Paella, Tapas, Spanish, Outdoors, Authentic

Name: La Gramola
Description: Great food (Fusion Spanish), excellent friendly service and delicious cocktails.

Name: Cafe de las Horas
Description: Perfect place to try "Agua de Valencia". Unique interior design - usually very busy in the evenings.

Name: L'Aprenent de Tapes
Description: Creative tapas with a global touch, plus cocktails, at an understated retro bar with a terrace.

Name: Café Infanta
Description: Breakfast & tapas at a decades-old tavern decorated with Hollywood portraits & random memorabilia.
